description: Represents a process instance related command or event.

bpmnElementType.description: the BPMN type of the current process element.

bpmnEventType.description: the BPMN event type of the current process element.

bpmnProcessId.description: the BPMN process id this process instance belongs to.

elementId.description: the id of the current process element, or empty if the id is not specified.

flowScopeKey.description: the key of the activity instance that is the flow scope of this flow element instance; -1 for records of the process instance itself.

parentElementInstanceKey.description: the key of the element instance that created this instance, or -1 if it was not created by another process instance.

parentProcessInstanceKey.description: the key of the process instance that created this instance, or -1 if it was not created by another process instance.

processDefinitionKey.description: the key of the deployed process this instance belongs to.

processInstanceKey.description: the key of the corresponding process instance

version.description: the version of the deployed process this instance belongs to.
